summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby, Harry Best, and Lesley Groff discussing a change in schedule for a meeting with Jeffrey. The email highlights the need for a fax number to complete an ISDA agreement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in the communication regarding the ISDA agreement.

persons.name: Harry Best
persons.context: Harry Best is mentioned as a recipient of the email and is asked to provide a fax number.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is the sender of the email who is coordinating the communication between Amanda and Harry.

connections.description: Amanda and Lesley are colleagues working together on the ISDA agreement.
Amanda is reaching out to Harry for assistance with the fax number needed for the ISDA agreement.
Lesley is coordinating communication between Amanda and Harry, indicating a working relationship.

keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence dated October 2, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is seeking a fax number to complete an ISDA agreement.
Lesley Groff is facilitating communication between Amanda and Harry Best.
